amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds in the bill to carry out a market promotion program if the program provides assistance to the U.S. Mink Export Development Council, or to any mink industry trade association.
amendment.purpose: An amendment preprinted in the Congressional Record of July 11 as amendment No. 5, that prohibits the use of funds in the bill to pay the salaries of personnel who carry out the Market Promotion Program if the program provides assistance to the U.S. Mink Export Development Council, or to any mink industry trade association.

action.text: On agreeing to the Deutsch amendment (A030) Agreed to by recorded vote: 232 - 160 (Roll No. 553).
